about_the_game:
The Digital Extras include the Darksiders Genesis Soundtrack by Gareth Coker and the Artbook for Darksiders Genesis with more than 60 pages.

Tracklist

1. Darksiders Genesis Theme

2. Dethroned
3. The Hollow Lord
4. The Slag Pit
5. Lava Roller.
6. Inferno Vault
7. Icebind Cavern
8. The Beacons
9. The Hoard
10. Mammon
11. Decay
12. The Holdback
13. Belial.
14. Astarte.
15. Bastion's Fall.
16. The Maelstrom
17. Dagon
18. Dredge Works
19. Blackstone Keep
20. Moloch
21. Credits

name: Darksiders Genesis - Digital Extras

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD FX-8320 (3.5 GHz) / Intel i5-4690K (3.5 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3930K (3.2 GHz)/AMD Ryzen 5 1600 (3.2 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: The Digital Extras include the Darksiders Genesis Soundtrack by Gareth Coker and the Artbook for Darksiders Genesis with more than 60 pages.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Hindi, Persian
*languages with full audio support
